text: Harlequin is an album released by American entertainer Lady Gaga. It was released September 27, 2024, through Interscope Records and is Gaga's first album under her own imprint, Lil Monsters LLC. Harlequin is a mix of pop standards and original material. It was described by Gaga as a "companion album" to the film Joker: Folie à Deux (2024), in which Gaga stars as Lee, a reimagination of Harley Quinn. Gaga's fiancé, philanthropist Michael Polansky, is also credited as a writer on several tracks. The album differs from the original soundtrack. ==Track listing== Credits taken from Genius. Tracks 1–11 produced by Gaga and Benjamin Rice. == References == Category:Lady Gaga albums Category:2024 albums
title: Harlequin
